entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as speaking to Harry and explaining why he was placed in Gryffindor. He is described as beaming and having a moustache that quivers.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is being spoken to by Dumbledore. He is mentioned as having determination and resourcefulness.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is a house at Hogwarts that Harry is a part of. It is mentioned as being associated with bravery and daring.

entities.name: tom riddle
entities.description: Tom Riddle is mentioned as someone who was placed in Slytherin, unlike Harry who asked not to go there.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as having a desk where Dumbledore picks up the blood-stained silver sword from.

entities.name: godric gryffindor
entities.description: Godric Gryffindor is mentioned as being associated with the blood-stained silver sword that Harry sees engraved on it.

relationships.description: Dumbledore speaks to Harry and explains why he was placed in Gryffindor.
Harry is a part of the house Gryffindor at Hogwarts.
Dumbledore reaches across Professor McGonagall's desk to pick up the blood-stained silver sword.
Harry is associated with Godric Gryffindor through the blood-stained silver sword that he sees engraved on it.
